headline: Everest Announces Preliminary Commentary on Full-Year and Fourth Quarter 2024 Results
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, January 27, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. (NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing best-in-class property, casualty, and specialty reinsurance and insurance solutions, today announced preliminary financial results in advance of its full year and quarterly earnings to be released on February 3, 2025.
